summary: The module defines a class that encapsulates the MODFLOW‑6 well (WEL) package. It provides methods to build, convert, and read well specifications expressed in the MODFLOW‑6 list format, handling time‑varying data and translating between cell‑identifier based datasets (layer, row, column) and the array structures required by the simulator.
business_intent: Facilitate the creation, manipulation, and I/O of well boundary condition data for MODFLOW‑6 simulations, ensuring correct formatting and integration with the model's data structures.
